participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and passionate about her pets, she often seeks positivity despite the challenges she faces.
participant_1.background: My pets are all rescues and they have brought so much joy into my life. I work at a local party store. I loved to ride my bike in the countryside with my dad. I am a lesbian.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and humorous, they love to bring joy to others through their impressions and storytelling.
participant_2.background: I will entertain others with my celebrity impressions and make them happy. I like to do all my shopping at Walmart. I roll my dice, and imagine new worlds. I am a librarian in my current job.

content.text: I am angry at my coworker, but my pets and I are making it through.
They were just so rude to me for no reason at all, and I have been trying to be nice.
I am sorry to hear that. I will make you feel better.
I will do my best to impersonate your coworker and make you laugh.
That is a good idea! I love it when you do celebrity impressions.
I am glad you enjoy it. I will put on my best voice and do my best.
That was great! You sound just like them!
I am glad you like it. I can do a lot of other voices too.
I would love to hear them sometime.
I will be happy to do that
